name: eFootball
summary: eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami. Released in September 2021, it marks a significant shift in the Pro Evolution Soccer (PES) series. Konami rebranded the franchise to eFootball and transitioned to a free-to-play model and a new engine, Unreal Engine.

name: eFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2025 - Deluxe
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

The Leo Messi Edition 2025 - Deluxe comes with the free-to-play eFootball core game, an Epic "Lionel Messi (2005–06 FC Barcelona)" player card, 10 Highlight player cards, 22 Training Program experience tokens, a custom Messi uniform, and 450 eFootball Coins as a purchase bonus

name: EF Universe: Reclaiming the World
summary: An idle game with a collectible card theme. Open booster packs, collect cards, build an elaborate stat chain, manage 6 different currencies, battle your way across 6 different regions, and reclaim the world!

name: eFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2025
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

The Leo Messi Edition 2025 comes with the free-to-play eFootball core game, an Epic "Lionel Messi (2005–06 FC Barcelona)" player card, 7 Highlight player cards, 11 Training Program experience tokens, and 250 eFootball Coins as a purchase bonus.

name: eFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2026
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

eFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2026 includes Lionel Messi as an Epic player, along with seven Highlight players—Chris Wood, Jonathan Clauss, Kevin De Bruyne, Luka Modrić, Nicolás Otamendi, Robert Lewandowski, and Yassine Bounou. The edition also features stadium elements such as the Leo Messi Edition ’26 stadium choreography and the Leo Messi Golden Statue ’26 giant props, as well as eleven 4,000 EXP tokens. As a purchase bonus, it grants 250 eFootball Coins.

name: eFootball: Lamine Yamal Edition 2026
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

eFootball: Lamine Yamal Edition 2026 includes Lamine Yamal as an Epic player, along with seven Highlight players—Aleksandar Pavlović, Anatolii Trubin, Benjamin Šeško, Dean Huijsen, Josip Stanišić, Milos Kerkez, and Pedri. Additional content features stadium elements such as the Lamine Yamal Edition ’26 stadium choreography and the Lamine Yamal Golden Statue ’26 giant props, as well as eleven 4,000 EXP tokens. As a purchase bonus, it provides 250 eFootball Coins.

name: eFootball 2023
summary: eFootball 2023 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami as part of their ongoing eFootball series. Released in August 2022, it is an update to eFootball 2022 rather than a completely new title, continuing the free-to-play model introduced with the previous instalment.

name: Effing Hail
summary: Dive into a weather diagram and lay waste to a city by wielding your power over hail!

name: EFourGames
summary:
E4KM Games
An interactive gaming platform offering a variety of chat-based games fully in Arabic. It focuses on quick thinking, word challenges, and luck-based mechanics like wheel spins, designed to make group play exciting and engaging.

name: eFootball PES 2021 Season Update
summary: eFootball PES 2021 Season Update is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami in 2020. It serves as a standalone update to eFootball PES 2020, featuring updated player rosters, team kits, and competitions. The gameplay remains largely unchanged.

name: Efficus: Kono Omoi wo Kimi ni...
summary: Efficus - Kono Omoi wo Kimi ni... is a dating simulation by Genki that is based on a school social standing, such as who you hand around with and when. Its time is based by a monthly calendar and as the months go by you will be able to advance your social standing with different women, including 2 different teachers at your school.

name: Efficus: Kono Omoi wo Kimi ni...
summary: Efficus - Kono Omoi wo Kimi ni... is a dating simulation by Genki that is based on a school social standing, such as who you hand around with and when. Its time is based by a monthly calendar and as the months go by you will be able to advance your social standing with different women, including 2 different teachers at your school.

name: E-FCC
summary: Immerse yourself in the action with E-FCC, the official Fast Close Combat video game, now available on Steam! E-FCC brings you a realistic airsoft simulation experience, based on the innovative sport of Fast Close Combat (FCC). Take on your friends or other online players in intense 1-on-1 duels where every hit counts.

name: Effective Immediately
summary: All intergalactic travel passes through the orbital relay checkpoint. Verify ID discrepancies, repair vehicle systems and struggle against ethical dilemmas as you negotiate a shifting political landscape. Report for duty, effective immediately.

name: Effulgence RPG
summary: Effulgence is a party-based RPG in a sci-fi setting. Players will explore a distant, possibly extinct world, battle its hostile inhabitants, craft gear, and develop their characters. All graphics in Effulgence are made of text symbols, making it visually unique.

name: eFootball: Lamine Yamal Edition 2026 - Deluxe
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

eFootball: Lamine Yamal Edition 2026 - Deluxe includes Lamine Yamal as an Epic player, along with ten Highlight players—Aleksandar Pavlović, Anatolii Trubin, António Silva, Benjamin Šeško, Dean Huijsen, Josip Stanišić, Milos Kerkez, Nico Williams, Pedri, and Warren Zaïre-Emery. Additional content includes the Lamine Yamal Edition 2026 [Deluxe] strip, stadium elements such as the Lamine Yamal Edition ’26 stadium choreography and the Lamine Yamal Golden Statue ’26 giant props, three types of Lamine Yamal Edition 2026 avatar icons, a Lamine Yamal Edition 2026 avatar background, and twenty-two 4,000 EXP tokens. As a purchase bonus, it grants 250 eFootball Coins.

name: eFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2026 - Deluxe
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

eFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2026 - Deluxe includes Lionel Messi as an Epic player, along with ten Highlight players—Chris Wood, James Rodríguez, Jonathan Clauss, Kevin De Bruyne, Luka Modrić, Mohamed Salah, Nicolás Otamendi, Robert Lewandowski, Stefan de Vrij, and Yassine Bounou. Additional content includes the Leo Messi Edition 2026 [Deluxe] strip, stadium elements such as the Leo Messi Edition ’26 stadium choreography and the Leo Messi Golden Statue ’26 giant props, three types of Leo Messi Edition 2026 avatar icons, a Leo Messi Edition 2026 avatar background, and twenty-two 4,000 EXP tokens. As a purchase bonus, it grants 450 eFootball Coins.

name: eFootball: Neymar Jr Edition 2025 - Deluxe
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

The Neymar Jr Edition 2025 - Deluxe comes with the free-to-play eFootball core game, an Epic "Lionel Messi (2005–06 FC Barcelona)" player card, 10 Highlight player cards, 22 Training Program experience tokens, a Neymar Jr Edition 2025 uniform, and 450 eFootball Coins as a purchase bonus.

name: eFootball: Neymar Jr Edition 2025
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

The Neymar Jr Edition 2025 comes with the free-to-play eFootball core game, an Epic "Neymar Jr (2014 Brazil)" player card, 7 Highlight player cards, 11 Training Program experience tokens, and 250 eFootball Coins as a purchase bonus.

name: Effigy
summary: A retro FPS/metroidvania set on a prison moon overrun by a cult of former prisoners.

name: eFootball: Mourinho Edition 2026
summary:
eFootball is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami.

In eFootball: Mourinho Edition 2026, manager José Mourinho appears alongside a new skill, the "Diagonal Long Pass A" Link-up Play. The edition also includes two Highlight players—Son Heung-min and Memphis Depay—who meet the conditions for the Centrepiece and Key Man roles. As a purchase bonus, it provides 150 eFootball Coins.

name: Ef: The First Tale.
summary: One Christmas Eve night, two old friends reunite in a certain church. Their paths may have strayed, but the story of how they were reunited will prove to be fantastical, touching the lives of many couples along the way.

name: eFootball 2022
summary: eFootball 2022 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami. Released in September 2021, it marks a significant shift in the Pro Evolution Soccer (PES) series. Konami rebranded the franchise to eFootball and transitioned to a free-to-play model and a new engine, Unreal Engine.

name: eFootball PES 2020
summary: eFootball PES 2020 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami. Released in September 2019, it is the 19th instalment in the Pro Evolution Soccer series and the first to include the "eFootball" branding, reflecting Konami's focus on esports.

name: Effie
summary:
Effie is a 3D action-adventure game that combines classic elements from the genre, such as combat, platforming, and puzzles, with the exploration of an expanded world. Live a unique fantasy adventure, free the cities from a powerful and dark evil, and relive the look and feel of old-school video-games!

Experience a unique adventure:
Delve into the adventure of Galand, a young man in his quest to recover his youth after a witch cursed him with premature old age. Defeat all the sinister creatures, overcome all the platforming challenges and solve the most complex puzzles!

Runestone, your travel companion:
A powerful black magic controls the cities of the region of Oblena. To face evil, you will carry a magic shield that will allow you to defend yourself, to fight and to surf across the red grassland. It will gradually grow in power and skills!

Relive the feeling of old-school video-games:
We all have fond memories of those incredible classic 3D action-adventure games. We have used those references to bring those sensations back to life again, but with modern graphics, controls and game-play!

name: Effugium
summary: Effugium is a horror / puzzle game consisting of multiple sagas that each have a different goal and add extra mechanics. Find items, solve puzzles and change the direction of gravity while teleporting a monster to a random location as your only means of defense.

name: Eftu
summary: In a world threatened by a mysterious interdimensional entity, pick your guild, pick your ship, and pick your battles! Compete with other guilds for resources in a variety of game modes, including Team Versus, Battle Royale, and Racing!

name: Effortworld
summary: A very difficult hack for SMW with 57 exits

name: Efflorescence of Lust
summary: Efflorescence of Lust is a combination of puzzle and clicker games. It helps enhance your agility and reaction capability. It can also help you get a relief from anxiety by playing it.

name: Effugium
summary: Explore a cold, abandoned, and dreary facility to piece together its mysteries and find a means for escape from the horror that lurks within.

name: Efemeris
summary: Efemeris is an strategy boardgame dedicated to 2 players.

name: EFO: Escape From Outerworld
summary: EFO is a side scrolling platformer, wherein you control an alien who has crash landed, and must reach the top of the mountain in order to call for a ride home before the battery on your distress beacon runs out. The climb is difficult, but you have the power of telekinesis!

name: Efi
summary: A short arcade game about a mama bird on a quest to rescue her children

name: EF2000 v2.0
summary: The next version of N/N+ from Metanet Software is available as freeware on PC with level editor, legacy levels and two player co-op.

name: Effing Worms
summary: Effing Worms lets you play as a massive worm that's currently underground, and is hunger for flesh. There's only one goal in this game, and that's to eat as much human/animal flesh as you can by jumping out from the ground - that is, before you get destroyed by their military effort to stop you from eating them.

name: eFootball PES 2020: Legend Edition
summary:
This version includes:

- 1 player available from 11 legend players.
- Premium Agent (30 weeks)
- 3 player contracts renewals (30 weeks).
- Lionel Messi is available as a loan player (10 matches).
- Ronaldinho 3D scanned version from 2019.

name: Efpiyes
summary: Efpiyes is a multiplayer first-person shooter with a built-in map editor that anyone can use.

name: eFootball 2022
summary: The Android and iOS ports of eFootball 2022.

name: eFootball Champion Squads
summary: eFootball Champion Squads is a card game centred around the football game eFootball.

name: eFootball 2024: Leo Messi Edition
summary: Messi, the living legend, is joining your team. Introducing the special boosted edition of "eFootball" - No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: EF 2000
summary: Made by the same team that produced TFX, this simulation focuses on the Eurofighter 2000. Set in a fictional campaign against Russia, you are called into action when a Russian force attempts to take control of Norway and Sweden as a foothold to an invasion of northern Europe. You'll play through a variety of randomly-generated missions ranging from patrols to ground strikes. Included as well is a fairly extensive multi-player support, including network and modem play.

name: eFootball 2024
summary:
eFootball 2024 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami as part of their ongoing eFootball series. Released in September 2023, it is an update to eFootball 2023 rather than a completely new title, continuing the free-to-play model introduced with the previous instalments.

The game features updated team rosters, enhanced graphics, and refined gameplay mechanics.

name: eFootball PES 2020
summary: The Android and iOS port of eFootball PES 2020.

name: Ef: A Fairy Tale of the Two.
summary: Ef: A Fairy Tale of the Two is a bundle that compiles both The First Tale and The Latter Tale for the PlayStation 2.

name: Ef: The Latter Tale.
summary: In this direct continuation of "Ef: The Latter Tale.", Yuu tells the tale of a young woman who has lost one of her eyes due to an accident, but who may have lost so much more beneath the surface.

name: EF-12: Fighting Game Maker
summary: A fully customizable 3D fighting game.

name: Efera & Jiliora: The Emblem From Darkness
Effy: One of Unreasonable "If"
summary: Effy: One of Unreasonable "If" is a Japanese 3D flight shooting game set in a post-alien invasion Earth where military corporations vie for control of extraterrestrial technology. Players take on the role of Navaho, a mercenary test pilot recruited by ICKX Military Research to operate the Y1 combat aircraft. The game features a fully voiced narrative and combat mechanics centered around two specialized systems: ACS and RCS, which players must master to dominate aerial battles.

name: Effigy: The Descent
summary: Effigy: The Descent is a first-person survival-horror game in which you will face statues, with your lantern as your only tool to stop them. Gather all artefacts from the cave and freedom will be yours !
